Relative Links:

Pages:

  • Home Page (../)
  • Page 1 (./page1.html)
  • Page 2 (page2.html)
  • Page 3 (page3.html)

Images:

  • Image 1 (../images/image1.jpg)
  • Image 2 (../images/image2.jpg)
  • Image 3 (../images/image3.jpg)

Root-Relative Links:

Root relative links can be used on any html page in your directory. They all begin with a forward slash (/) which represents the root folder. As you will notice, the root relative links are the same on every page.

  • Home Page (/)
  • Page 1 (/pages/page1.html)
  • Page 2 (/pages/page2.html)
  • Page 3 (/pages/page3.html)
  • Image 1 (/images/image1.jpg)
  • Image 2 (/images/image2.jpg)
  • Image 3 (/images/image3.jpg)
